low_ctr_campaigns.original_ad_message: Check out our summer collection! Great styles at affordable prices.

creative_suggestion.headline: Summer Styles That Turn Heads | 24hr Flash Sale
creative_suggestion.body_text: Beat the heat with our exclusive summer collection. Limited-time 30% off all new arrivals. Free shipping on orders over $50!
creative_suggestion.rationale: Added urgency with time-limited offer, specific discount percentage, and free shipping incentive to increase click motivation.

low_ctr_campaigns.original_ad_message: Quality fitness equipment for your home gym. Various options available.

creative_suggestion.headline: Transform Your Home Gym | Expert-Designed Equipment
creative_suggestion.body_text: Achieve your fitness goals with our professional-grade equipment. Used by Olympic athletes. 5-year warranty and free personal training session with purchase.
creative_suggestion.rationale: Added social proof (Olympic athletes), warranty information, and value-add (free training) to build credibility and increase perceived value.
